item.title: 10 most fascinating scientific discoveries of 2021
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: 2021 saw a tentative return to “normal” life. Scientists returned to their labs, continued to take on Covid, blackholes, climate change and delved into so much more. Let us take a look at some of the most fascinating scientific discoveries of 2021.
